divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on a bench waiting for a bus, when I looked up in the sky in front of me, and saw a object that looked like a white balloon, yet it didn't move around like a balloon, and moved in a straight line of its own volition, I watched it come from the N to south, heading over the ocean. It went behind me, and I didn't see it anymore. This was in Long Beach, CA about 7 am in the morning. I just watched it and didn't know what it was, it had no wings, and didn't divert from its flight path.
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Long Beach
There were no other sightings in Long Beach on or around February 27th 2011
Summary: saw at 4th and orange n to s looked like white balloon
